refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays a list of all the top-level objects in the current database.

refsection.para: Displays a list of all the top-level objects in the current database. The top-level objects are all those objects that are not referenced by some other combination. The hierarchical structure of BRL-CAD databases usually means that there will be a top-level object that includes all (or at least most) of the objects in the database.
The example shows the use of the tops command to list all the top-level objects in the current database.

info.title: List all the top-level objects in the current database.

example.para: Lists all the top-level objects in the current database.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
